headline.main: Issue: Food as a Weapon. Solution: Disarmament.

docs.lead_paragraph: CHRIS CHAPMAN was in her office listening to a middle-aged, somewhat overweight man complain about what he called an embarrassing passion: frozen pastries. Any variety of pastry would do, the man confided, as long they were frozen and his wife did not know that he was pilfering them. (Usually he stood at the freezer door and crammed them into his mouth.)
